biotools.summary:
Variance-adjusted Mahalanobis (VAM): a fast and accurate method for cell-specific gene set scoring

Distribution of squared modified Mahalanobis distances computed using the VAM method on simulated null scRNA-seq data. The densities of the non-central chi-squared approximation and estimated gamma distribution are also plotted. a) Density estimates for data with a simulated sparsity of 0.5. b) Density estimates for data with a simulated sparsity of 0.8.
